Description:
Rule to detect the configuration of Run Once registry key. Configured payload can be run by runonce.exe /AlternateShellStartup

Author: Avneet Singh @v3t0_, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Run Once Task Configuration in Registry
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((target_object like '%\microsoft\active setup\installed components%' and target_object like '%\stubpath') and  not ((details like '%c:\program files\google\chrome\application\%' and details like '%\installer\chrmstp.exe" --configure-user-settings --verbose-logging --system-level%') or ((details like '%c:\program files (x86)\microsoft\edge\application\%' or details like '%c:\program files\microsoft\edge\application\%') and details like '%\installer\setup.exe" --configure-user-settings --verbose-logging --system-level --msedge --channel=stable')))
